caption:
COLD NOODLES FOR SUMMER ❄️🍜⁣
⁣
One of my favorite things to make during summer is cold cucumber soup🥒 It’s tangy, bright, and so refreshing!⁣
⁣
Inspired by that, I wanted to make cold noodles with refreshing broth, using @omsom Soy Garlic Saucy Noodles, and its garlicky flavors paired SO WELL with cold cucumber soup ✨⁣
⁣
You can add some shredded chicken or soft-boiled eggs for extra protein, and don’t forget to top your noodles with lots of ice 🧊⁣
⁣
⁣
#coldnoodles #easyrecipes #cucumber #comfortfood #summerrecipes
